TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CipherReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class CipherReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 表示 XML 加密中的 元素。

span.span: Represents the element in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 XML ``加密中的元素。This class represents the `` element in XML encryption. 它标识处理后生成加密数据的源。It identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data. 引用的实际加密数据是通过``以下过程获取的。The actual encrypted data referenced by the `` is obtained by the following process. ` URI`属性包含取消引用的统一资源标识符 (URI)。The ` URI` property contains a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that is dereferenced. ``如果元素还包含一个转换链, 则通过取消对 URI 的引用而生成的数据将按指定方式进行转换以生成加密的数据。If the `` element also contains a transform chain, the data resulting from dereferencing the URI is transformed as specified to produce the encrypted data. 例如, 如果在 XML 文档中对加密数据进行 base64 编码, 则转换会指定一个 XPath 表达式, 后跟 base64 解码, 以便可以提取加密的数据。For example, if the encrypted data is base64-encoded within an XML document, the transforms would specify an XPath expression followed by a base64 decoding so the encrypted data can be extracted. URI 和转换的语法与 XML 数字签名类似。The syntax of the URI and transforms is similar to that of XML digital signatures. 但在 XML 数字签名中, 生成和验证处理都以相同的源数据开头, 并按相同顺序执行该转换。However, in XML digital signatures, both generation and validation processing start with the same source data and perform that transform in the same order. 在 XML 加密中, 解密应用程序只包含加密的数据和指定的转换。In XML encryption, the decrypting application has only the encrypted data and the specified transforms. 转换将按照获取加密数据所需的顺序进行枚举。The transforms are enumerated in the order necessary to obtain the encrypted data. **注意**默认情况下, 你不能从具有未知源的文档 (如来自网站的文件) 取消引用密码引用 , 因为属性为**null**。**Note** By default, you cannot dereference cipher references from documents with unknown sources, such as files from a Web site, because the property is **null**. 例如, 当你尝试对包含``引用 Web 上的文件的元素的文件进行解密时, 即使请求是由完全受信任的程序集发出的 , 也会引发。For example, when you attempt to decrypt a file containing a `` element that references a file on the Web, a is thrown, even if the request is made by a fully trusted assembly. 如果你确定要解密的文档可以信任, 则可以使用以下代码为完全受信任的应用程序更改此行为:If you are sure the documents you are decrypting can be trusted, you can change this behavior for fully trusted applications by using the following code: ``` Evidence ev = new Evidence(); ev.AddHost (new Zone(SecurityZone.MyComputer)); EncryptedXml exml = new EncryptedXml(doc, ev); ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的一个新实例。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个对象, 该对象提供对象的引用信息。This constructor creates a object that provides reference information for a object. 参考信息提供了加密数据的位置。The reference information provides the location of the encrypted data.

param.span: 指向加密数据的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the encrypted data.

summary.span: 使用指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用指向加密数据的统一资源标识符 (URI) 来创建对象。This constructor creates a object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that points to the encrypted data. 然后, 将使用对象来提供对象的引用信息。The object is then used to provide reference information for a object. 可以使用 URI 指定包含加密数据的 XML 文件。You can use a URI to designate an XML file containing encrypted data. 例如:For example: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml";` 你还可以使用部分 URI 来指定仅加密部分 XML 文档。You can also use a partial URI to designate that only a portion of an XML document is to be encrypted. 例如, 假定一个名为 document 的 xml 文档包含两个`MyForm`元素, 如下面的 xml 代码示例所示:For example, assume that an XML document named document.xml contains two `MyForm` elements as shown in the following XML code example: `` `` `` `` `` `` 仅可`Form2`使用如下所示的 URI 加密内容:You can encrypt only the content in `Form2` using a URI such as the following: `String uri = "http://www.woodgrovebank.com/document.xml#Form2";` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的一个新实例。The following code example creates a new instance of . [!code-cpp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[cryptography.Xml.CipherReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/cryptography.Xml.CipherReference/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用统一资源标识符 (URI) 和转换链来创建对象, 以指示加密的数据。This constructor creates a object using a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain to indicate the encrypted data. 然后, 将使用对象来提供对象的引用信息。The object is then used to provide reference information for a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的一个新实例。The following code example creates a new instance of .
